description: Set a color/brightness and possibliy turn the light on/off.

entity_id.description: Name(s) of entities to set a state on.

....description: All turn_on parameters can be used to specify a color.

infrared.description: Automatic infrared level (0..255) when light brightness is low.

zones.description: List of zone numbers to affect (8 per LIFX Z, starts at 0).

transition.description: Duration in seconds it takes to get to the final state.

power.description: Turn the light on (True) or off (False). Leave out to keep the power as it is.
